basic.description: This course involves participation in a research project on a selected topic as designated by the directing professor and the student. Participation includes more advanced work than PSY 4920 and a written product, the nature of which is detailed in a written contract between professor and student.
basic.subject: PSY
basic.title: Honors Advanced Research Topics

extra.enrollment_requirement: Prerequisites: PSY 2012, acceptance into the University Honors Program, instructor permission.
